00009         class SoftwareCommentFollowupEmail extends SoftwareCommentEmail
00010         {
00011                 const default_subject = '[Emeraldion Lodge] New comment on: %s';
00012                 
00018                 public function SoftwareCommentFollowupEmail($params)
00019                 {
00020                         if (isset($params['comment']) &&
00021                                 $params['comment'] instanceof SoftwareComment)
00022                         {
00023                                 $this->comment = $params['comment'];
00024                         }
00025                         else if (isset($params['comment_id']))
00026                         {                               
00027                                 $this->comment = new SoftwareComment();
00028                                 $this->comment->find_by_id($params['comment_id']);
00029                         }
00030                         $this->comment->belongs_to('softwares');
00031                         
00032                         $this->name = $params['name'];
00033                         $this->email = $params['email'];
00034                         $this->subject = !empty($params['subject']) ?
00035                                 $params['subject'] :
00036                                 sprintf(self::default_subject, $this->comment->software->title);
00037                         $this->recipient = $params['email'];
00038                         $this->headers = "From: Emeraldion Lodge<emeraldion@emeraldion.it>";
00039                         $this->text = <<<EOT
00040 Author: {$this->comment->author}
00041 Comment:
00042 {$this->comment->text}
00043 EOT;
00044                         $this->date = date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00045                 }
00046                 
00051                 public function make_text()
00052                 {
00053                         $software_url = $this->comment->software->permalink(FALSE);
00054                         $comments_url = $this->comment->software->comments_permalink();
00055                         return <<<EOT
00056 There is a new comment on the software {$this->comment->software->title}. 
00057 {$software_url}
00058 
00059 {$this->text}
00060 
00061 See all comments here:
00062 {$comments_url}
00063 
00064 Unsubscribe from email notifications for this thread:
00065 {$comments_unsubscribe_thread_url}
00066 Unsubscribe from all email notifications:
00067 {$comments_unsubscribe_all_url}

00071 http://www.emeraldion.it
